OK, so I accepted the "Test Launch Escape System" contract. It says to be going between 230 and 730 m/s, altitude between 8300 and 12000, flying at Kerbin. OK, I did all that, but when I activate it, the contract is not completed. It activates the system, but I don't get the contract completion. The "Test Launch Escape System" task is still unfulfilled. What the?

I've noticed that sometimes during tests, you have to use a special "test" button on the object, but in this task, there is no special test button. So I assume I just have to activate it. But that doesn't work. What am I doing wrong?
Did you activate it by staging, or by action groups? Only the former works, IIRC.

I activated it by the abort button. So I guess that's the problem. I'll try to do it with staging.

ETA: Yep, that worked. Thanks FatboyTim.

What does the contract details say, specifically?

If you've been activating the L.E.S by right clicking on it and selecting the option or using the abort button, the chances are you need to activate it by staging instead; manually activating things doesn't always trigger contract completion for whatever reason.
